# units

**Instance Property**

The measuring system — imperial or metric — to use for units.

## Declaration

```swift
var units: MKDistanceFormatter.Units { get set }
```

## Discussion

You can use this property to explicitly set the measuring system for units. The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKDistanceFormatter/Units-swift.enum/default], which bases the measuring system on the user’s locale.

## Specifying the format

- **locale**: The locale to use when formatting strings.
- **MKDistanceFormatter.Units**: Constants that reflect the type of units to use in the string.
- **unitStyle**: The preferred style for units.
- **MKDistanceFormatter.DistanceUnitStyle**: Constants that indicate the format style to use for strings.
